title: Exhaust Sound: Flowmaster Direct-Fit Mufflers for 09-16 Dodge RAM 1500 5.7L
description: Learn the features and benefits of Flowmaster's Direct-Fit Mufflers (part #s 817568 and 817633), then listen to them installed on a souped-up Dodge RAM.

asset.title: Flowmaster Direct-Fit Mufflers - 2009-2016 Dodge/RAM 1500 5.7L - 817568 and 817633
asset.description:
Questions? Give us a call (707) 544-4761
817568: http://bit.ly/1UYJUWj  817633: http://bit.ly/1OhiyXk
Visit Flowmaster's website: http://bit.ly/1fyGZRh

Flowmaster Part #817568 (American Thunder) 
Flowmaster Part #817633 (Outlaw)

Test Vehicle: 2015 Ram 1500 with a 5.7L engine.

Application:
Fits 2009 to 2016 Dodge/Ram 1500 trucks with a 5.7L V8 engine, fits 2 and 4 wheel drive models and all wheelbases.

Features:
These systems are designed to directly replace original mufflers using factory hangers and connections. With easy fit in mind, these units utilize mandrel bent tubing (where applicable) for maximum performance and include specially selected mufflers. Flowmaster American Thunder direct-fit mufflers deliver a moderate interior and exterior tone and are suited to the enthusiast who wants their performance to be heard without breaking the bank. Flowmaster Outlaw Series direct-fit mufflers are perfect for the person looking for a very deep and aggressive sound level outside and inside the vehicle. Like all Flowmaster systems, the benefits include improved throttle response, power and mileage. Designed for an easy fit, these systems include all necessary parts and hardware for easy installation.

✓ Stainless Steel Construction
✓ Moderate Sound exterior exhaust tone
✓ Includes hangers and hardware for easy installation
✓ Dyno tuned for maximum performance
